name: part_012
file: tmp_hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Concert： Promise 2 You 【#Promise2U】 [9hMVpcDYS-0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Transition sequence featuring fly-through shots of a futuristic city and the pyramid stage.
IRyS, Ouro Kronii, and Hakos Baelz appear on stage for an MC segment, discussing the concert and their performance.
Merchandise announcement segment for the 'Promise 2nd Anniversary Celebration'.
Final lead-in to the last segment followed by a dramatic 'Stage Change' where the platform begins to fly.
